formatted_address: 3 South Buona Vista Rd, #01-41 Viva Vista, Singapore 118136
name: XO Cafe

reviews.text: Cozy cafe run by young adults. Owners are very creative and the food is prepared by the owners in their kitchen. To name a few we had, the soufflÃ© is amazingly bouncy, soft and delicious, including the sushi bake which is tastefully prepared. Thank you for hosting us

had the delicious mochi pancake with ice cream ($11.90), iced coffee ($6) and matcha latte ($6), highly recommend!! interior is very cosy and the cafe owners were very kind

they also have cocktail nights every friday and saturday from 6-10pm so might check that out in future :-)

If you're a tourist like me, don't be put off by the fact that this is a little bit out of the way. The souffle pancakes were absolutely incredible and the espresso soda is exactly what I needed to get through the Singapore heat. Definitely recommend especially if you're heading over this way to check out Haw Pa Villa or other attractions over this way.
Chocolate Souffle pancake S$10. A price was reasonable and taste was very nice! Staffs are kind and comforable, while space is bit limited.

A cozy cafe with awesome drinks and friendly owners. The matcha latte is some of the best in Singapore - concentrated premium matcha flavour (not the typical diluted milky kind). The coffee was good too, strong and smooth. We enjoyed the mochi waffle as well ðŸ˜‹

vicinity: 3 South Buona Vista Road, #01-41 Viva Vista
